data.lyric:
[ti:Must've Never Met You]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:This One’s for You Too (Deluxe Edition)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Must've Never Met You - Luke Combs (卢克·库姆斯)
[00:03.45]Lyricist：Luke Combs/Jonathan Singleton/Robert Williford
[00:06.90]Composer：Luke Combs/Jonathan Singleton/Robert Williford
[00:10.36]Producer：Scott Moffatt
[00:13.81]Just pick yourself up dust yourself off they say it ain't that hard
[00:19.35]
[00:20.08]But just puttin' one foot in front of the other ain't gettin' me too far
[00:25.42]
[00:26.53]This movin' on ain't comin' along the way they said it would
[00:32.16]I guess whoever said the grass is greener
[00:35.00]
[00:35.64]Must've never seen the other side
[00:37.95]
[00:38.99]What don't kill you makes you stronger
[00:41.39]
[00:42.67]Sure sounds like a lie
[00:44.47]
[00:45.36]And whoever said that time heals everything
[00:48.10]
[00:49.09]And everything will be alright
[00:50.98]
[00:51.86]Whoever said it ain't the end of the world
[00:55.38]And you'll find somebody new
[00:57.33]
[00:57.89]Must've never met you
[00:59.75]
[01:04.76]Must've never heard you say you'd never
[01:07.54]Leave me then watch you walk away
[01:10.08]
[01:11.44]Must've never fell as hard as I did 'cause then they wouldn't say
[01:16.41]
[01:16.95]Maybe it wasn't meant to be yeah maybe
[01:20.01]
[01:20.89]You're better off alone
[01:23.27]I guess whoever said the grass is greener
[01:26.16]
[01:26.90]Must've never seen the other side
[01:29.17]
[01:30.00]What don't kill you makes you stronger
[01:32.58]

[01:35.67]

[01:39.20]

[01:42.24]

[01:46.52]And you'll find somebody new

[01:50.40]

[01:57.84]

[02:04.46]Yeah maybe you're better off alone
[02:07.77]I guess whoever said the grass is greener

[02:14.02]
